title: Better Place to Live
details:
> Full Tile House (Included Bed Rooms)
> Closer to Biyagama - Kadawatha Highway.
> In-front Of 224 Pugoda - Pettah, 226 Dekatana - Pettah, 228 Weliweriya - Pettah Main
Bus Route And 24/7 Bus Service.
> Around Companies - 24/7 Open Laugh Petrol Station, Lion Beer Company, Coca Cola
Company, Laugh Gas Station.
> Near to Manelwatta Temple, Thalwatta Temple, Kelaniya Temple And Water World.
> Short Cut Roads to Makola,Kiribathgoda, Kadawatha, Gampaha, Kelaniya, Peliyagoda.
